member.name: T:Discord.Addons.Preconditions.MinimumOnlineUsersAttribute
member.summary: Sets how many users must be online in order to run the command. This precondition ignores BOT accounts.

member.name: M:Discord.Addons.Preconditions.MinimumOnlineUsersAttribute.#ctor(System.UInt32)
member.summary: Sets how many users must be online in order to run the command.
member.param: The minimum amount of users that must be online.

member.name: T:Discord.Addons.Preconditions.RatelimitAttribute
member.summary: Sets how often a user is allowed to use this command or any command in this module.
member.remarks: This is backed by an in-memory collection and will not persist with restarts.

member.name: M:Discord.Addons.Preconditions.RatelimitAttribute.#ctor(System.UInt32,System.Double,Discord.Addons.Preconditions.Measure,Discord.Addons.Preconditions.RatelimitFlags)
member.summary: Sets how often a user is allowed to use this command.
member.param: The number of times a user may use the command within a certain period.
The amount of time since first invoke a user has until the limit is lifted.
The scale in which the parameter should be measured.
Flags to set behavior of the ratelimit.

member.name: M:Discord.Addons.Preconditions.RatelimitAttribute.#ctor(System.UInt32,System.TimeSpan,Discord.Addons.Preconditions.RatelimitFlags)
member.summary: Sets how often a user is allowed to use this command.
member.param: The number of times a user may use the command within a certain period.
The amount of time since first invoke a user has until the limit is lifted.
Flags to set bahavior of the ratelimit.

member.name: T:Discord.Addons.Preconditions.Measure
member.summary: Sets the scale of the period parameter.

member.name: T:Discord.Addons.Preconditions.RatelimitFlags
member.summary: Used to set behavior of the ratelimit

member.name: F:Discord.Addons.Preconditions.RatelimitFlags.NoLimitInDMs
member.summary: Set whether or not there is no limit to the command in DMs.

member.name: F:Discord.Addons.Preconditions.RatelimitFlags.NoLimitForAdmins
member.summary: Set whether or not there is no limit to the command for guild admins.

member.name: F:Discord.Addons.Preconditions.RatelimitFlags.ApplyPerGuild
member.summary: Set whether or not to apply a limit per guild.

member.name: T:Discord.Addons.Preconditions.RequireLowerHierarchyAttribute
member.summary: Indicates that the user passed as an argument requires to be lower than the bot in the Hierarchy.

member.name: T:Discord.Addons.Preconditions.RequireRoleAttribute
member.summary: Sets a specific role the invoking user must have.

member.name: T:Discord.Addons.Preconditions.UserMustBeInVoiceAttribute
member.summary: Indicates that this command should only be used while the user is in a voice channel.
